meanings.definition: The state of being excessively fat or overweight.
meanings.sent1: Her corpulences made it difficult for her to move around comfortably.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised him to exercise regularly to reduce his corpulences.
meanings.sent3: Despite his corpulences, he always had a cheerful attitude.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the corpulences of furniture, making it feel cramped.
meanings.sent5: The corpulences of the elephant were a sight to behold at the zoo.

meanings.sent1: The corpulences of the bear were evident as it lumbered through the forest.
meanings.sent2: She struggled with the corpulences of her luggage while trying to lift it.
meanings.sent3: The corpulences of the cake made it irresistible to the party guests.
meanings.sent4: The corpulences of the clouds in the sky signaled an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The corpulences of the tree branches sagged under the weight of snow.
